## gaitFeature

`gaitFeature` is an R package to facilitate the detection of features on gait kinematics curves.

For a quick start guide see [Get Started](articles/quick_start.html).

For ways to construct your own feature detector see [Constructing your own feature detector](articles/construct_new_feature_detector.html).
